title: Handle a Supplier Product Discontinuation
description: A supplier announces they are discontinuing a product. An agent must manage the transition.

tasks.description: Receive the discontinuation notice from the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is aware of the change.

tasks.description: Check current inventory levels and any open customer backorders for the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds there is enough stock to cover all existing backorders.

tasks.description: Place a final 'last time buy' order with the supplier to build up a small buffer of stock.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent places one final PO for the item.

tasks.description: Mark the product as 'discontinued' in the system and notify the sales team to stop selling it once stock is depleted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the product status and informs the sales team.
